filmography.title: Kiss of Death
filmography.role_description: A giggling, psychopathic hitman who famously pushes a woman in a wheelchair down a flight of stairs; Widmark's iconic film debut.
filmography.plot: An ex-con trying to go straight is forced to help the district attorney capture a sadistic killer.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor; Golden Globe: Win – Most Promising Newcomer

filmography.title: The Street with No Name
filmography.role_description: A calculating, hypochondriac gangster who attempts to build a crime empire using scientific methods.
filmography.plot: An FBI agent goes undercover to infiltrate a violent gang of thieves led by a ruthless mobster.

filmography.title: Road House
filmography.role_description: A jealous, volatile nightclub owner who turns violent when the singer he loves falls for his best friend.
filmography.plot: A nightclub owner hires a singer and falls for her, but when she prefers his manager, he frames the man for embezzlement.

filmography.title: Yellow Sky
filmography.role_description: A greedy, treacherous outlaw who clashes with his gang leader (Gregory Peck) over gold found in a ghost town.
filmography.plot: A band of bank robbers on the run from the law wind up in a ghost town, where they terrorize an old man and his granddaughter.
filmography.awards: WGA Award: Win – Best Written American Western

filmography.title: Down to the Sea in Ships
filmography.role_description: A modern, educated maritime officer who clashes with an old-fashioned whaling captain over how to train the captain's grandson.
filmography.plot: A captain's grandson wants to be a whaler, but his grandfather wants him to study, leading to a conflict on the high seas.

filmography.title: Slattery's Hurricane
filmography.role_description: A bitter former Navy pilot who seeks redemption by flying a dangerous reconnaissance mission into a hurricane.
filmography.plot: A pilot recounts his life and loves while flying a plane into the eye of a storm.

filmography.title: Night and the City
filmography.role_description: A desperate, small-time American hustler in London who dreams of becoming a big-time wrestling promoter but gets in over his head.
filmography.plot: A small-time hustler in London dreams of becoming a wrestling promoter but gets in over his head with the local mob.

filmography.title: Panic in the Streets
filmography.role_description: A Public Health Service officer who races against time to catch a criminal carrying the pneumonic plague in New Orleans.
filmography.plot: A doctor and a policeman in New Orleans have forty-eight hours to locate a killer infected with pneumonic plague.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Win – International Award

filmography.title: No Way Out
filmography.role_description: A virulent racist and hoodlum who torments the black doctor (Sidney Poitier) treating his brother.
filmography.plot: A doctor, the first African-American resident at a county hospital, is assigned to treat two racist brothers who have been shot during a robbery.

filmography.title: Halls of Montezuma
filmography.role_description: A tough Marine lieutenant leading his platoon through the brutal Pacific campaign during WWII.
filmography.plot: Marines battle the Japanese on a heavily fortified island while their commander deals with his own personal issues.

filmography.title: Don't Bother to Knock
filmography.role_description: A cynical airline pilot who becomes involved with a mentally unstable babysitter (Marilyn Monroe) at a hotel.
filmography.plot: A pilot staying at a hotel begins a romance with a babysitter, unaware that she is a dangerous mental patient.

filmography.title: Pickup on South Street
filmography.role_description: An arrogant, unpatriotic pickpocket who unwittingly steals top-secret microfilm and becomes a target for communist spies.
filmography.plot: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

filmography.title: Broken Lance
filmography.role_description: The eldest son of a cattle baron who rebels against his father's tyranny in this Western retelling of King Lear.
filmography.plot: A cattle baron's empire is threatened by his own sons, leading to a family feud and legal troubles.

filmography.title: Garden of Evil
filmography.role_description: A cynical cardsharp who joins a rescue mission into Apache territory for a share of a gold mine.
filmography.plot: Three soldiers of fortune are hired by a woman to rescue her husband from a gold mine located in sacred Indian territory.

filmography.title: The Cobweb
filmography.role_description: The head of a psychiatric clinic who struggles with staff politics, patients, and his own marriage.
filmography.plot: Staff and patients at a psychiatric clinic clash over drapes for the library, revealing deep personal dysfunctions.

filmography.title: Run for the Sun
filmography.role_description: A reclusive author who is hunted through the Mexican jungle by war criminals after his plane crashes.
filmography.plot: An author and a female reporter crash-land in the Mexican jungle and are hunted by Nazis hiding there.

filmography.title: Time Limit
filmography.role_description: A military investigator who risks his career to uncover the truth behind a war hero's collaboration with the enemy.
filmography.plot: A colonel investigates a major accused of collaborating with the enemy in a Korean POW camp.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: The Law and Jake Wade
filmography.role_description: A ruthless outlaw who forces his former partner, now a marshal, to lead him to buried loot.
filmography.plot: An outlaw forces his old partner, who has gone straight, to help him find buried money.

filmography.title: Warlock
filmography.role_description: A former gang member who becomes the deputy sheriff to stand up against his old crew and a hired gunslinger.
filmography.plot: A famous gunman becomes the marshal of Warlock to end a gang's reign of terror, but his methods spark a conflict with his former deputy.

filmography.title: The Alamo
filmography.role_description: The legendary knife-fighter and adventurer who commands the volunteers at the Alamo, clashing with William Travis.
filmography.plot: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

filmography.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
filmography.role_description: The impassioned American military prosecutor determined to convict Nazi judges for their crimes against humanity.
filmography.plot: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

filmography.title: Two Rode Together
filmography.role_description: A cavalry officer who accompanies a cynical marshal into Comanche territory to negotiate the return of captives.
filmography.plot: A corrupt marshal and an army officer travel into Comanche territory to rescue white captives.

filmography.title: How the West Was Won
filmography.role_description: A ruthless railroad boss who prioritizes the construction schedule over peace with the Native American tribes.
filmography.plot: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the building of the railroads.

filmography.title: The Bedford Incident
filmography.role_description: An obsessive, Ahab-like Cold War destroyer captain who ruthlessly hunts a Soviet submarine.
filmography.plot: An American destroyer captain is determined to confront a Soviet submarine caught violating territorial waters, risking nuclear war.

filmography.title: Madigan
filmography.role_description: A tough, rule-bending New York detective who has 72 hours to recapture a killer who took his gun.
filmography.plot: Two detectives have a weekend to find a killer after they lose their guns to him.

filmography.title: Murder on the Orient Express
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, mysterious American whose murder aboard the train sets off the famous investigation.
filmography.plot: In December 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

filmography.title: Coma
filmography.role_description: The chief of surgery at a Boston hospital who is implicated in a sinister conspiracy involving patients falling into comas.
filmography.plot: A young doctor uncovers a conspiracy at her hospital where healthy patients are falling into irreversible comas.

filmography.title: Against All Odds
filmography.role_description: A corrupt and powerful lawyer involved in a kidnapping scheme in this remake of 'Out of the Past'.
filmography.plot: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend, but the player falls in love with her.
